Text.Page:
The giant naga population is getting out of control. You'll need to clear some of them out.

Focus on the {@LinkCreature:10#18#naga leviathans}.

Report to Libine at the Coastal Overwatch when the mission is complete.
Those nagas are nothing but trouble. I'm glad we're rid of them.
It's a simple choice: Fight the nagas now, or fight the angry serpent-god Dagon later.
